org.qi4j.api.association

Interface NamedAssociation<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Parameterized associatee type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractAssociation, Iterable<String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamedAssociationWrapper

    public interface NamedAssociation<T>
extends Iterable<String>, AbstractAssociation
    Association to named Entities. The Iterable<String> returns the names in the association set.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Checks if there is an association with the given name.

      Retrieves a named association.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        iterator

    • Method Detail

      • count

        int count()
        Returns:
        The number of named associations in this NamedAssociation.

      • containsName

        boolean containsName(String name)
        Checks if there is an association with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the association we are checking if it exists.
        Returns:
        true if it exists, false otherwise

      • put

        boolean put(String name,
          T entity)
        Adds a named assocation.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the association.
        entity - The entity for this named association.
        Returns:
        true if putted, false otherwise

      • remove

        boolean remove(String name)
        Remove a named association.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the association.
        Returns:
        true if removed, false otherwise

      • get

        T get(String name)
        Retrieves a named association.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the association.
        Returns:
        The entity that has previously been associated.

      • nameOf

        String nameOf(T entity)
        Checks if the entity is present. Note that this is potentially a very slow operation, depending on the size of the NamedAssociation.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to look for.
        Returns:
        The name of the entity if found, otherwise null.

      • toMap

        Map<String,T> toMap()
        Returns:
        A fully populated Map with the content of this NamedAssociation.
